message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. I believe it can significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,300,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best return on investment while aligning with your strategic goals.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the detailed explanation of the product's benefits. However, the price of $1,300,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product, reflecting its value to me while ensuring a fair deal for both of us. I'm confident this price allows you to achieve a good return on investment.
